article: How to Open a Beer Bottle with a Lighter
intro: A lack of a bottle opener can ruin any party. Unless, of course, you know how to wield a lighter in its stead. Opening a beer bottle with a lighter is all about leverage. You simply use one hand to hold the lighter firmly under the cap, and the other to pop off the top.

steps.title: Push down quickly  but firmly on the lighter to remove the cap.
steps.subtitle: You should feel the lighter digging slightly into your finger, but quick downward pressure should pop the top quickly. It is exactly the same pressure and firm movement that you would use with a traditional bottle opener.
sub-points: It may help to angle the beer slightly towards the lighter. If so, push down parallel to the bottle to get the most force on the lighter.

steps.title: Try another method if you still can't get the cap off.
steps.subtitle: Luckily, there is a variety of other methods to open a beer bottle that don't require a lighter.
sub-points: Use a door by placing the cap in the frame (the small metal square that allows the door to stay closed) and applying downward pressure to pop the cap off.
